---
title: "Cohort Event Monitoring of Patients Treated with a Tenofovir/Lamivudine/Dolutegravir (TLD) Regimen in Mozambique"
categories: ["Public_health","Statistics"]
year: 2023
---

I worked as the primary statistician on this project done as a part of the USAID Medicines, Technologies, and Pharmaceutical Services (MTaPS) Program that enables low- and middle-income countries to strengthen their pharmaceutical systems,

### Overview

1.  Statistical analyses to evaluate factors such as health conditions, medications at baseline for a cohort of 2000+ HIV positive patients administered with the TLD regimen in Mozambique.
2.  Analyzed risk factors for adverse events using logistic regression analysis.
